hero.heading: 24/7 Availability for Your Patients. Zero Phone Stress for Your Team.
hero.subText: Our intelligent AI assistant handles all phone calls around the clock. It schedules appointments, answers questions, automatically creates tasks, and relieves your team.

features.heading: The relief ||| your team deserves
features.subText: The Docline AI assistant solves the biggest challenges in everyday practice

relief.title: Relief
relief.line1: The AI ​​assistant handles an average of 75% of routine calls completely independently.
relief.line2: Your team gains this time back for more patient care.

conversation.title: Docline handles 20 calls at the same time
conversation.text: No busy signals or waiting queues. The AI answers all calls in parallel – every patient is reached immediately.

triage.title: Intelligent triage & forwarding
triage.text1: The AI detects urgency. Complex inquiries are
triage.text2: prioritized and forwarded directly to the responsible staff.

availability.title: Availability
availability.text: Your practice is available 365 days a year. The AI ​​handles all calls – regardless of holidays, illness, or staff shortages.

integration.title: Easy connection to your phone system
integration.text: No switching, no IT stress. Our onboarding team will connect you to your existing telephone infrastructure quickly and easily.

software.title: No additional software or hardware required
software.text: Docline runs entirely in the cloud. You save on physical devices, IT maintenance, and can design your processes flexibly.

customization.title: Perfectly tailored to your practice
customization.text: Tone, rules, and phrasing are customized individually. Many patients don’t even realize they are speaking to AI.

slider.heading: The Modern Workflow Your  ||| Team Will Love
slider.subText: The key to a practice that doesn't just respond but also works smarter together.

slides.title: Clear Overview. More Efficiency
slides.subtitle: The dashboard that makes management easier and faster.
list: See all key metrics, patients, and appointments in one view.
Unanswered calls and pending tasks clearly highlighted.
Easy to navigate and quick to master.

slides.title: Optimized Workflow
slides.subtitle: Integrated task management ensures efficiency.
list: Pending requests are instantly assigned as tasks.
Categorize tasks: Open - In Progress - Completed.
Manual task creation for internal administration.

slides.title: Patient & Data Insights
slides.subtitle: Get a complete view of performance data.
list: Track daily, weekly, and monthly reports easily.

slides.title: Collaborative Dashboard
slides.subtitle: Work together in real time.
list: Instant team updates and task sharing.
All team data unified in one workspace.

exampleSection.heading: This is what Docline ||| sounds like in everyday practice
exampleSection.subText: Your patients will hardly notice the difference. Easily adapt the AI assistant's voice to your practice's style. Choose a confident male or female voice. This ensures a smooth and professional reception for every call.

functions.heading: Everything you need to relieve the ||| burden on your practice

feature1.title: Reduced Phone Load
feature1.description: Free up your staff from routine inquiries. Our AI voicebot handles appointment bookings, prescriptions, and routine questions 24/7, so your team can focus on the patients.

feature2.title: Human AI Communication
feature2.description: Docline is the next generation in patient communication. It understands context, languages, and urgency and processes concerns with human precision.

feature3.title: Multilingual
feature3.description: Our voicebot communicates fluently in over 25 foreign languages.

feature4.title: GDPR-Compliant
feature4.description: Your security is our top priority.

features.title: Server in the EU
features.description: We guarantee that all your patient data is stored exclusively in certified high-security data centers within the EU.
features.subDescription: This ensures your data is optimally protected, even against third-party access.

features.title: Legal Compliance
features.description: The legally required Data Processing Agreement (DPA) is an integral and transparent part of your Docline contract.
features.subDescription: It regulates all responsibilities legally and gives you immediate compliance assurance without having to check legal details yourself.

features.title: Comprehensive Logging
features.description: Every access, change, and administrative action within Docline is logged comprehensively and tamper-proof.
features.subDescription: The audit log guarantees full transparency and allows you to always prove compliance with confidentiality standards.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: All data captured by the Voicebot is end-to-end encrypted (both in transit and at rest).
features.subDescription: We meet the strictest requirements for the confidentiality of your sensitive patient data.

testimonials.quote: Since using Docline, we know that our patients can always reach us while our team works stress-free. The solution not only transformed our phone accessibility but also significantly improved team morale. A real relief in daily practice.
testimonials.name: DR. MAGDALENA S.
testimonials.title: DERMATOLOGIST

testimonials.quote: The implementation of Docline was seamless and the results exceeded our expectations. Our patients appreciate constant accessibility.
testimonials.name: DR. THOMAS M.
testimonials.title: GENERAL PRACTITIONER

testimonials.quote: Docline revolutionized our practice. The team can finally focus on important tasks while patients are well taken care of.
testimonials.name: DR. SARAH K.
testimonials.title: DENTIST
